alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 29 at 3:40AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Franklin and Harlan Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 340 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Alma, or 22 miles north of Phillipsburg, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Alma around 345 AM CDT. Orleans and Republican City around 350 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Huntley and Ragan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
